resources.string: "This app includes a comprehensive Ohm's Law calculator to help determine and convert values for voltage, current, resistance, and power, supporting a range of standard units and formula variations for different circuit configurations."

"Ohm's Law is a fundamental principle in electrical engineering and physics that describes the relationship between voltage (V), current (I), and resistance (R) in an electrical circuit. It states that the current through a conductor between two points is directly proportional to the voltage across the two points and inversely proportional to the resistance of the conductor."
